duties_responsibilities.duty: Represent the values of the company with every client interaction by displaying deep passion and generating excitement with clients.
Engage with clients and fellow team members in a multi-level, matrixed, and client-centric environment.
Actively manage the pipeline of prospects and leads in company database, with a focus to influence prospects with product purchase.
Master and maintain familiarity with all product features and functionality.
Work toward becoming a subject matter expert in all areas related to the industry and the competitive landscape.
Work with fellow team members with customer purchasing cycle and addressing questions to finalize purchase.
Collaborate with team members in other functional and areas of the business to ensure a seamless client sales experience including Service, Inside Sales, DMV, Logistics, etc.
Contribute to a positive, innovative, and inclusive work environment.
Partner with management, regional management, human resources, and facilities as required.
Perform other related duties as assigned.
